Articles.Content: on a mac is this the correct placement for the mechjeb modhttps://i.imgur.com/MzRcPIr.png because when i go to the main menu i get this message https://i.imgur.com/Q4TsgTI.png. (i kept all the files that were in the MechJeb folder when i downloaded it in the folder) can somebody please tell me what I'm doing wrong

Is <KSP root>/Plugins empty? The error message suggests that there is a MechJeb2.dll in there.  Mod .dlls should be in <KSP root>/GameData/<modname>/Plugins/.

Installation is the same on any supported OS.

Edited March 20, 2018 by steve_v

15 hours ago, steve_v said:

Is <KSP root>/Plugins empty? The error message suggests that there is a MechJeb2.dll in there.  Mod .dlls should be in <KSP root>/GameData/<modname>/Plugins/.

Installation is the same on any supported OS.

yes there was i got rid of it. thanks
